meanings.definition: To arrange (text) in a particular way by selecting and setting type.
meanings.sent1: I will typeset the document for the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The publisher typeset the book before printing.
meanings.sent3: After hours of typesetting, the text looked perfect on the page.
meanings.sent4: Her words were typeset in my mind, creating a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The typeset words jumped off the page, capturing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The process of setting type for printing.
meanings.sent1: The typeset of the newspaper was flawless.
meanings.sent2: She learned about typeset while studying graphic design.
meanings.sent3: The typeset machine broke down, causing a printing delay.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked like a typeset, arranging thoughts neatly.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the typeset in the book made it a joy to read.
